Experience Account Lead Yahoo December 2013  – Present (1 year 9 months) Burbank, CA Seek ways to solve problems both inside the company and with our exterior partners to garner better ROI for advertisers and better results for the company, by identifying issues and finding creative ways to rectify or circumvent them. 
 
Tirelessly pursue entertainment advertisers to adopt new search and native advertising strategies, when many traditional clients are reluctant to try new ad units, by finding new ways to position the benefits and by discovering tactics that entertainment clients can use to their best advantage. 
 
Assumed leadership role amongst peers, when there had not previously been a lead role in entertainment, by providing reporting across the sales org on entertainment’s progress and finding new ways to motivate colleagues to achieve their goals. 
 
Took on more clients than is custom in the Yahoo field organization in order to provide sub-category expertise and more focused attention to movie, television and streaming advertisers. Senior Account Manager, Search Yahoo! August 2012  –  December 2013  (1 year 5 months) Burbank, CA Greatly over-achieved entertainment vertical sales goals when most verticals were merely hitting the goals, using a framework that focused on the needs and opportunities of the advertiser. 
 
Named one of top 6 search account managers, out of over 70 AMs, by applying my entertainment experience and my creativity to search marketing & native accounts. 
 
Accelerated the success of entertainment advertisers, when the upside potential in the vertical was in question, as a result of bringing innovative thinking and new structure to making these unique clients successful in digital marketing. Senior Creative Strategist Yahoo! March 2011  –  August 2012  (1 year 6 months) Burbank, CA Proved that high engagement drives advertiser adoption, in a time of growing SLAs, by reducing response times and increasing proactive thinking for agency search clients. 
 
Honored as one of the top creative strategists of over 30 CSs, by showing my ability to thrive under pressure and by finding new ways to deliver results during critical times. Creative Strategist Yahoo! June 2008  –  March 2011  (2 years 10 months) Burbank, CA Quarterbacked an onshore/offshore team to migrate over 2,000 accounts from Yahoo SEM to Bing (the second highest number in the company) by involving, motivating and empowering my team members in an extremely stressful time. 
 
Identified the need for new client-facing account analysis presentation templates in the new Yahoo/Bing partnership, when others were consumed by the migration, and assembled a group of peers across offices to build new PowerPoint templates which redefined how the company presented campaign reviews. Search Enhancement Associate Yahoo! November 2006  –  June 2008  (1 year 8 months) Burbank, CA Engineered AutoHotKey program to work on top of new tools that were designed for function and not for usability, and saw a 50% increase in team productivity. 
 
Adapted and thrived in the then new Yahoo Panama environment, amongst weekly changes in processes and tools, and proved that flexibility brings success to the team.
